## Map of Utrecht city, The Netherlands
```{r}
library(leaflet)
my_map<-leaflet() %>%
  addTiles()
my_map <- my_map %>% 
  addMarkers(lat = 52.0837232,
             lng = 5.1237233,
             popup = "Utrecht, NL")
set.seed(2020-09-01)
df <- data.frame(lat = runif(100, min = 52.05, max = 52.15),
                 lng = runif(100, min = 5.05, max = 5.15))
df %>%
  leaflet() %>%
  addTiles() %>%
  addMarkers(clusterOptions = markerClusterOptions())
```
